amendment.description: To direct the Corps of Engineers to construct a portion of the modified water delivery project in the State of Florida.

action.text: Amendment SA 139, as previously agreed to, was further modified by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Amendment SA 139 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 139 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Graham FL. (consideration: CR S1416, S1431-1433) To direct the Corps of Engineers to construct a portion of the modified water delivery project in the State of Florida.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 139 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 139 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Graham FL.
